General.Name: Hubei Yingtong Telecommunication Cable Co Ltd
General.Description: YingTong Telecommunication Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, marketing, and sale of telecommunication cables. The company offers communication cables, such as enamel wires, earphone cables, luminous/reflective cables, special shape cables, teflon cables, medical cables, USB, and HDMI cables; data cables; earphones; and wireless chargers. Its products are used in mobile communication products, personal computer, audio and video playback equipment, and other intelligent term devices. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Tongcheng, China.
